monster.name: Objecte Animat (Enorme)
senses: visió a cegues 30 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Animat
entries: If the object lacks legs or other appendages it can use for locomotion, it instead has a flying speed of 30 feet and can hover. If the object is securely attached to a surface or larger object, such as a chain bolted to a wall, its speed is 0.
When the objecte animat drops to 0 hit points, it reverts to its original object form, and any remaining damage carries over to its original object form.
The DM might rule that a specific objects slam attack inflicts slashing or piercing damage based on its form.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany contundent.
